name: Merge Towers (itch)
description:
Spend electrons to place 5 different towers on the field:

Tower 1 is a damaging tower(stack 3 for a bonus)

Tower 2 is a slowing tower 

Tower 3 halfs the health of the enemies 

Tower 4 gives you more electrons every 2 rounds

Tower 5 gives you more health every 2 rounds

Mute audio with m
